title: NO SPECIAL CELL FOR FONSEKA, SAYS PRISONS COMMISSIONER GENERAL
content: September 30, 2010: There are no special cells within the prison, said the Prisons Commissioner General Major General V. R. De Silva, speaking on the measures that will be taken with regard to Sarath Fonseka, as the President has approved the verdict of the court martial. “From this point on, he becomes a prisoner. After…
